dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Amillidius, a global advertising company, has been promoting marketing knowledge for nine years now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Amillidius, a global advertising company, has been promoting marketing knowledge for nine years now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For eight years now, Amillidius has seen its mission in the promotion of marketing knowledge and been trying to protect entrepreneurs from the losses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they do these free seminars worldwide, which is pretty incredible when you think about it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they do these free seminars worldwide, which is pretty incredible when you think about it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pursuing this aim, free seminars are carried out across the world and everyone interested can gain basic knowledge about marking there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and their founder, Bogdan Terzi, mentioned that they really focus on demystifying marketing for their clients.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and their founder, Bogdan Terzi, mentioned that they really focus on demystifying marketing for their clients.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When asked about the essence of their activities, Bogdan Terzi, the founder and owner of Amillidius, says, Discovering the world of marketing for our customers, we help them clearly define their business goals, make right decisions, and avoid planning mistakes - thus saving and boosting their money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, helping them avoid planning pitfalls and uh, maximize their financial returns.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, helping them avoid planning pitfalls and uh, maximize their financial returns.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They've got this whole range of services too—brand image creation, customer acquisition, even a specialized advanced marketing course.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've got this whole range of services too-brand image creation, customer acquisition, even a specialized advanced marketing course.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The basic service list includes creating and introduction of the brand image and introduction of the line of the new products, upgrade for the existing ones, attracting and retaining the customers. As a conveyor of marketing literacy, the company is not only focused on those planning to start their own business - for the experienced business people, there is a special proprietary advanced course in marketing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they just opened a branch in the UK, right? Because of high demand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they just opened a branch in the U K, right? Because of high demand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: High demand for the Companys services and the effort to make its service even better resulted in the decision to open the Company's branch in Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Their team includes SEO specialists, designers, programmers—really a full spectrum of experts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Their team includes S E O specialists, designers, programmers-really a full spectrum of experts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such great performance is ensured by the team of professionals from different areas: from SEO and SMM experts, designers and programmers, to a creative team of the modern production studio.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I like how they emphasize the brand platform. You know, that quote from Walter Landor—"Products are made in the factory, but brands are created in the mind."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I like how they emphasize the brand platform. You know, that quote from Walter Landor-Products are made in the factory, but brands are created in the mind.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Products are made in the factory, but brands are created in the mind, - Walter Landor, one of the pioneers of the modern branding, memorably stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's such a key insight. Amillidius uses that to build emotional connections with consumers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's such a key insight. Amillidius uses that to build emotional connections with consumers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is this platform that turns a product or a service into a brand, building up an emotional concept, drawing consumers attention, ensuring efficient communication between the brand and its target audience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're big on lead generation too—contextual ads, social media targeting, all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're big on lead generation too-contextual ads, social media targeting, all that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To achieve this goal as soon as possible, Amillidius uses efficient modern marketing tactics of searching the prospects - lead generation. Partially, this problem is addressed by contextual advertising the ads emerging after using search engines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Did you see the stat about comments influencing 92% of users' purchasing decisions? They prioritize maintaining a positive brand image because of that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Did you see the stat about comments influencing ninety two percent of users' purchasing decisions? They prioritize maintaining a positive brand image because of that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the statistics, purchasing decisions of 92% of users are based on the comments. This is the reason why Amillidius pays great attention to maintaining the positive image of the brand and products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It makes sense. Consistent marketing is everything, and they position themselves as the solution for that consistency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes sense. Consistent marketing is everything, and they position themselves as the solution for that consistency.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One must not forget that success asks for consistent marketing. And consistent marketing is Amillidius.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For entrepreneurs especially, it sounds like a game-changer—whether you're just starting out or you're already established.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For entrepreneurs especially, it sounds like a game-changer-whether you're just starting out or you're already established.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a conveyor of marketing literacy, the company is not only focused on those planning to start their own business - for the experienced business people, there is a special proprietary advanced course in marketing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. They offer both individual and group sessions to help business owners systemize what they know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. They offer both individual and group sessions to help business owners systemize what they know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During both individual and group classes, the marketing-practicing professionals help the business people systematize the knowledge they already have and gain more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And with all those tools and expertise, they really aim to take companies to what they call the "big league."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with all those tools and expertise, they really aim to take companies to what they call the big league.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius takes the companies to the big league.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's impressive how integrated their approach is—from seminars to advanced strategies, all under one roof.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's impressive how integrated their approach is-from seminars to advanced strategies, all under one roof.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amillidius is an international advertising company that provides a full range of integrated service.
